alert.note: Alert for Clear Creek (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 7:21PM MDT until June 21 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clear Creek County in central Colorado... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 721 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Brookvale, or 30 miles west of Denver, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Brookvale and Blue Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
